description: 2 vols. ff. 436, 295. 214 x 157; 173 x 102 mm. 37 lin. 1121 H. - on title page and last fol. of vol. 2 signature of Aḥmad ibn Sharaf al-Dasūqī. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 500 (X, commentary 1); S I, 684. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى جعل ذکره رىاض الصالحىن
